name: Jill Esterly
text: I have gotten many massages over the years but this was absolutely the best massage I've ever gotten. Hailey listened to all my concerns and applied the amount of pressure I asked for. She focused on the areas I had mentioned were giving me issues. The ambiance was extremely calming, soothing, and relaxing. It was a great experience all around. I will definitely be coming back here.

resp.text: We're so happy to hear you had a great experience! We hope to see you back again soon :)

name: Brad G
text: Michelle is a caring massage therapist. She's been helping me with my usual aches/pains resulting from a desk job for years.

name: Leigh Cella
text:
I have had many massages over the years. My massage was unlike any massage I have ever received. IT WAS AMAZING! And that does not even come close to how I would describe my massage.

If you want to feel better contact Abiding Hands Therapy now. Even a day after I still feel the tranquility.

Thank you Abiding Hands, thank you
-Leigh

resp.text: Thank you so much for you review! It was such a pleasure to have you in, we are so glad you enjoyed your experience with us!

name: Ladonna Allen
text: WOW, what an amazing session I had with Hailee! I have had many, many massages but never one that addressed and relieved so many of my issues. Not only did I leave completely relaxed, but I no longer had a headache and could move my neck and hips without cringing. If you are in need of a therapist that knows how to listen to you and provide the best deep tissue massage ever, then Hailee is your person. I live an hour away but it is certainly worth the trip and can’t wait to return.

name: April Jossey
text: I had the most wonderful massage with Hailee today. I went in with back pain & came out feeling so much better. She was a great listener when I told about my problem areas and she was able to easily find them and successfully work them out. I was so pleased with the experience that I’ve already scheduled my next appointment!

name: Kami Pearson
text: Hailee did a wonderful job! Very convenient location and very relaxing room! Best massage I’ve EVER had! I will definitely be back and I highly recommend it!

name: Tristan Graham
text: I had been driving to Birmingham to receive Myofascial Release Therapy once a week until I was referred to Hailee, and let me tell you that she is INCREDIBLE! I can walk in and just tell her to “fix me” and I leave feeling so much better. She is very knowledgeable, kind and calming. I highly recommend her.

name: Vanita Turner
text: Michelle, thank you for an amazing and perfect massage. It was my first Ashiatsu but will not be the last, you have definitely mastered this technique. The ambience in your therapy room is beautiful and relaxing. I will definitely look forward to my next sessions on future visits to Huntsville.

name: Beth Heflin
text: Michelle is amazing! Best massage I've ever had in my life. She listens and follows through. I don't feel like I've been beaten up. I feel fresh and new and energized! I recommend you make an appointment right away!

name: Jennifer Morgan
text: Michelle gives the best massages! I never had a massage I enjoyed before going to her and now I am a regular customer. She will work just the spots I ask her to so I can get the exact relief and relaxation I need!

name: Fern Brazda
text: I had one of the best massages. I have back problems and my back felt great, I was relaxed in this most comfortable relaxing atmosphere. Feeling relaxed without pain was my main objective and I came home pain free and relaxed! I can’t wait to get another ashiatsu  massage!

name: Travis Nixon
text:
I've been seeing Michelle at Abiding Hands for a while now.  When I was playing soccer and dancing regularly my muscles would get really tight and sore.  Michelle worked with me and after a couple of sessions the pain stopped.

I've had massages at other places that hurt and I just figured "pain = tight muscles leaving the body."  But with Michelle, I was surprised at how much release I got with almost no discomfort at all.  I would definitely recommend you give them a visit.

name: james elliott
text: Michelle is absolutely amazing.  I went for a 75 minute ashiatsu and I wish it wouldn’t have ended.  I felt the best I have ever felt and it was an experience I wish everyone would experience.  I highly recommend it.  If you are on the fence then make the appointment and you will not regret it.

name: Rebecca Stephens
text: Michelle is an amazing massage therapist! She's very professional and knowledgeable and cares about her clients. Highly recommend!

name: Misty Ortiz
text: I have tried several types of massage from many different places over the years and this was one of the best! I saw Michelle for an Ashiatsu massage. The pressure was deep and it was very relaxing and therapeutic!!

name: Jalesia Semien
text: This was an amazing experience and Michelle has wonderful spirit!

name: Lauren Honeycutt
text: Michelle did an amazing job. I was so relaxed during and after the massage. I will be going to her from now on-highly recommend.

name: Mollie Garland
text: Michelle is a wonderful massage therapist!  She has always provided an overall relaxing experience. I highly recommend her!

name: Stacy Pierce
text: Michelle worked with me while I was pregnant. She gives great prenatal massages and is obviously committed to helping all her clients. I would highly recommend her!

name: Rachel Rushing
text: Hailee’s intuitive ability to locate and work areas to release tension is amazing! Hailee combines her knowledge of the body with a flow that relaxes you while healing.

name: Amy Goddard
text: Michelle is a true professional. She knows her field, she cares about her clients, and she provides a warm, enjoyable atmosphere for relaxation. Refreshing is the word best used to describe Michelle and a session with her.

name: Tanya McCune
text: I received a phenomenal massage with Michelle.   Very professional and a superbly relaxing experience

name: Sandy Tebben
text: Hailee is awesome! Very professional, friendly and caring

name: Stacey Hinson
text: Michelle is an amazing Reiki practioner. In all my sessions she has taken great care to guide me through my healing process. She is intuitive and takes time to help me understand everything that comes through. If you are seeking am awesome Reiki practioner look no further...book now you won't regret it!

name: Shelly Carr
text: I was very skeptical about going because of a bad experience a couple of years ago but in desperate need, so glad I went . Hailee was very professional and tended to my needs. I will be a repeat customer!!

name: Ashley Freeman
text: Everyone needs to go see Michele at Abiding Hands Therapy! She is a miracle worker! Wouldn’t go to any other massage therapist!

name: Brian Terry
text: As a vinyl collector, I don’t normally like to share my “honey-holes”, but Urban Atlas has one of the best selections of used vinyl records that I’ve seen anywhere . Prices are very reasonable and everything I’ve bought or looked at was graded accurately. There’s also a large selection of clothing, candles , teas and other cool things. They offer yoga and meditation classes as well .

name: Mark Mitchell
text: Stopped in today first time,  great place and vibe, a real gem! Awesome vinyl section, picked up a few for the collection!

name: Callie White
text: Cute store but I’ll never shop here again. I was given a gift card for Christmas, which was purchased mid-December, and didn’t realize it had an expiration date. This wouldn’t have been a problem, except the expiration date was April 1st, a mere four months after it was purchased. The problem isn’t the expiration date itself, it’s the fact that it’s not even six months out + we’re in the middle of a global pandemic. It’s not the easiest to get out and use gift cards at the moment. According to the store owner, the money “can’t be held that long” as it’s “unfair to others who sell in the store,” despite the fact that the gift card was paid for, in cash, and should be treated as if it’s cash. This is bad business practice and has turned me off as a customer.

name: Adalanta Grimes
text: I visit every time I’m in Decatur and always find great birthday/Christmas gifts for my whole family plus tons of things that fit my own style!! Would definitely recommend checking it out next time you’re in Decatur!!

name: Rebeca Williams
text: Urban atlas is my favorite place in Decatur! I visit here at least once a week, and I always leave with at least 1 thing! They have the coolest records, crystals, art, plants, and so much more! A must see place if you’re in Decatur!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the review!!

name: Sara Hurley
text: Great place to find the best unique gifts! The owner is extremely helpful and nice. Highly recommended that you check this place out!!!

name: Caleigh Duncan
text: I LOVE Urban Atlas!! There’s always such a great collection of records, clothing, and jewelry!! The atmosphere is always welcoming and enjoyable too. Definitely suggest stopping by to have a look around even if you don’t have anything specific in mind you’re looking for!

name: Amanda Richards
text:
I love this store so much! They have the best incense. The scents burn cleanly, with none of that funky, smoky "incense" smell (If you've ever burned the cheap stuff, you know what I'm talking about.). Smells Like Teen Spirit is my fave! It reminds me of my grandfather's cigars- warm vanilla and cherry.

The teas are good, too! Try the vanilla caramel rooibos herbal. So good, and it has a natural sweet taste.

The employees are also always super friendly and welcoming. This is far and away my favorite hippie shop. 😍

name: Rachelle Harden
text: Absolutally love this place! I've been coming here for 3 years and the vibe is amazing and they have high quality products that are local and amazing staff who remember you. Recommend this place to anyone looking for a unique gift!

name: Jennifer Housley
text: Got a beatiful green wand, loved it, store is so unique, you can get stuff here you can't get other places for sure. Sure even does meditation classes

name: Greg Wolodkewitsch
text: Unique and wonderfully blended, with a smooth vibe and wonderful people. Don't miss out on a one of a kind store.

name: Jerry Cobbs
text: Love this place! They had a free meditation day and we went to three sessions. Such a cool, laid back vibe.

resp.text: Thanks Jerry! It was great to have you!

name: Miss Nikki Shortkonner
text: The girls are good to me and my son

name: Dede Quarry
text: No longer Urban Atlas...they have moved down the street.  It's a new home goods/decor shop called Miss Muldrews

name: Byron Cloer
text: Great place.. Great environment.. Great prices

name: Tyler Jackson
text: Amazing store and great staff!!

name: Sherri House
text: Super unique with great staff

name: Tammara Buckey
text: Great array of clothing, accessories, music and more!

name: Will
text: Love it 💕
